Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Collaboration \Col*lab`o*ra"tion\, n. 1. The act of working together; united labor. [1913 Webster]
2. the act of willingly cooperating with an enemy, especially an enemy nation occupying one's own country. [PJC]

collaboration n 1: act of working jointly; "they worked either in collaboration or independently" [syn: {coaction}] 2: act of cooperating traitorously with an enemy that is occupying your country [syn: {collaborationism}, {quislingism}]
